mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TA_BOARD (BOARD_IDX, TITLE, ID, CONTENT, IMPORTMANT, BOARD_CODE) VALUES(IDX_CRE.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{ID}, #{CONTENT}, #{IMPORTMANT}, '01')
